Class: IndexWorkerProxy

WinJSContrib.Search. IndexWorkerProxy

Proxy for a WinJSContrib.Search.Index running in a web worker

new IndexWorkerProxy(name, definition, workerpath)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

index name
definition WinJSContrib.Search.IndexDefinition

index definition
workerpath string

path for web worker script file (optional)
